course_description: Prerequisites: Multivariate Calculus (Calculus III), Linear Algebra, and Python programming. This course covers fundamental machine learning theory and techniques. The topics include basic theory, classification methods, model generalization, clustering, and dimension reduction. The material will be conveyed by a series of lectures, homeworks, and projects.
sections: Class Nbr: 4456, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 8:30-9:50a, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
